page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT IN RAMSGATE
page.content: Ramsgate once had several cinemas,dance halls,theatres,beach entertainers and amusement arcades.Two of the cinemas are now shops,the Kings is empty and the Classic will soon close.The Royal Pavilion theatre is now a casino;the Coronation ballroom is a bingo hall;the Granville ballroom has gone;Westcliff Hall is now a motor museum.The swimming pool is derelict and the new one is a mile inland. Along the West Cliff are a putting green,bowling green and Model Village.The bandstand is now a boating pool,cafe and monkey sanctuary. The harbour area has several discotheques & pubs,a casino and amusement arcades. Near the main beach is a fairground.The teen and twenties go to Nero's disco. On the East Cliff is a bandstand and the Granville Theatre which provides live entertainment all year round.The Castle Gallery is the local arts centre
